name: Bistro Napa Lounge
description: The Bistro Napa Lounge offers Reno's best Social Hour with half-price appetizers, specialty craft cocktails, and 40 premium wines by the glass from 4 PM to 6 PM daily. Set in an intimate Napa Valley-inspired atmosphere, it's the perfect spot for post-round drinks with your group.
shortDescription: Reno's best Social Hour — half-price appetizers and 40 wines by the glass at the Atlantis.

faqs.question: When is Social Hour at Bistro Napa Lounge?
faqs.answer: Daily from 4 PM to 6 PM — half-price appetizers and specialty cocktails.

faqs.question: Does Bistro Napa Lounge have wine by the glass?
faqs.answer: Yes — 40 premium wines by the glass, including an extensive Napa Valley selection.

testimonials.quote: The Social Hour at Bistro Napa is a must after a round of golf. Half-price apps and great wine — our group loved it.
testimonials.author: James R.

testimonials.quote: Best wine bar in Reno hands down. 40 wines by the glass and the staff really knows their stuff. Perfect pre-dinner spot.
testimonials.author: Michelle T.
